details.description:
Every conversion begins with a connection. Feathr helps nonprofits grow their reach, attract the right people, and deepen engagement - all in one platform.

As the solo founding designer on the product team since May 2023, I've worked on elevating and refining the overall look and feel of the app while contributing to the product roadmap. I've shipped features including Google Ad Grant integration, drip email campaigns, a lite version of the app for more approachable onboarding, and fundraising tools to incentivize product adoption.

My work spans the full design system, from component design to complex user flows, ensuring a cohesive and polished experience across the entire platform.

posts.title: GEICO
posts.caption: Design system modernization for one of America's largest auto insurance companies

gallery.alt: Mobile app screens showing quote flow and coverage options
Design system components including typography, colors, and UI elements
Plan selection interface on mobile device

details.description:
GEICO is an American auto insurance company, industry leader, and one of the largest companies in the United States. One of the primary challenges in this project was navigating GEICO's extensive existing design system, which required significant updates to meet modern standards of usability and scalability.

We conducted extensive research on user experience to identify areas for improvement, then updated and redesigned components to enhance user interactions and experiences for their digital products. The team developed a high-contrast color scheme to ensure accessibility and a visually appealing interface. All components were meticulously designed and developed to function seamlessly in both light and dark modes, ensuring consistency and usability across all platforms.

posts.title: Fan Controlled Football
posts.caption: A fan-driven football league where fans draft players, call plays, and make every decision

gallery.alt: Mobile app screens showing team selection, game activity, and rewards
Gamification elements including daily bonus, badges, and highlights voting
FCF website homepage with Football Controlled By The Fans headline
FCF website displayed on laptop mockup
User dashboard showing FanIQ points, badges, trophies, and open quests

details.description:
The Fan Controlled Football League is exactly what it sounds like: pick your team name, design your logo and jerseys, draft players, call plays, make every decision. As digital partners, Brave faced the challenge of blending gaming technology with real athletes to reimagine America's favorite sport in a completely fan-driven way.

To tap into existing UX muscle memory, we designed a platform that leverages natural expectations for a sports league while being visually positioned as something completely new and gamer-centric. Each week, fans have the power to draft players, engage in play-calling during the game, and make coaching/owner decisions for their team.

I designed high-fidelity screens for both the iPhone/Android app and desktop site based on the established design system. The interface features a scalable design system, high-contrast dark interface for accessibility and visibility, color psychology to help users navigate and categorize content, and a balanced approach between requirements and engaging design language.
